title: 501C.1303 SEVERABILITY.
text: If any provision located in sections 501C.0101 to 501C.1208 or their application to any person or circumstances is held invalid, the invalidity does not affect other provisions or applications of any provision located in sections 501C.0101 to 501C.1208 which can be given effect without the invalid provision or application, and to this end the provisions of this chapter are severable.
